market_share.shopify: 20% global e-commerce software market, 30% of US e-commerce websites, 24% of top 1M sites

context: Shopify holds 20% global e-commerce software market share and 30% of US e-commerce websites. Among top 1M sites, Shopify (24%) and WooCommerce Checkout (14%) lead. Global e-commerce market expected to reach $6.3T in 2024. Shopify serves millions of merchants across 175+ countries with 16,000+ apps in ecosystem.
